short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Optimized search results powered by Yahoo!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Angered by biased and censored search results? Fed up with the media monopoly’s trackers and prying eyes?

Us too! Power Search for Chrome is hard at work 24/7 … freeing the internet’s info and keeping you safe.

Activate Power Search for Chrome now to unlock:

Unbiased results: get uncensored access to information without hidden agendas
Privacy-focused: your searches won’t be tracked by the world’s largest media company (starts with “G’)
Control: easily adjust settings for more privacy whenever you want

Take back your online search freedom—for free and with no hassle.

Clicking “Add to Chrome” will upgrade your default search engine to Power Search (searchinchrome.com). Neutral and facts first. Searches are optimized by new, lightning-fast Yahoo tech.

[Note to users: our cause-based donation program concluded on 10/15/2024.]
